body_html: Thanks, but the implementation in keras only supports point-wise locally connected conv2d, I make the block-wise locally connected conv2d with overlap feature, a more complex reimplementation.
body_text: Thanks, but the implementation in keras only supports point-wise locally connected conv2d, I make the block-wise locally connected conv2d with overlap feature, a more complex reimplementation.
body: Thanks, but the implementation in keras only supports point-wise locally connected conv2d, I make the block-wise locally connected conv2d with overlap feature, a more complex reimplementation.
